goal: Produce a system design recommendation summarizing architectural choices, tradeoffs, and rationale for the Bellaventure project.

expected_input.design_spec: Path to the design specification document (provided externally).

steps.title: Review Source Materials
instruction: Open and review the design spec document provided externally.
Open and review the project README at `/Users/greghills/dev/ab-bellaventure/README.md`.

steps.title: Create Output File
steps.instruction: In the same directory as 'design_spec.md', create `<agent_name>_<YYYY-MM-DD>_system_design.md` following the scaffold at `output_template`.

steps.title: Draft System Design
steps.instruction: Populate the scaffold sections: directory structure, storage structure, and key design decisions/tradeoffs. Respect all constraints and thematic preferences.

steps.title: Finalize
steps.instruction: Ensure Markdown is clear, concise, and compliant with constraints. STOP and await human review before implementation.

constraints: Cloud Logging only (no alternative logging tech).
Use requirements.in and requirements.txt for dependencies.
Do not partition or cluster BigQuery tables.
preferences: Centralize logic in version-controlled code over external sources.
